title: Assessment: Parts and Needs of Plants

questions.question: What part of a plant helps it get sunlight?
What do plants need to take in from the soil to help them grow?
Which part of a plant helps support the leaf and flower by transporting nutrients?
What do plants release into the air that we need to breathe?
What part of a plant helps it make seeds?
What is the green part of a plant where photosynthesis happens?
What do plants use to drink from the soil?
Why is it important to water plants?
choices: To keep them healthy and help them grow

questions.question: Which of these is needed for plants to grow?
What is a tiny new plant that can grow from a seed called?
